calendarDays.description: Number of calendar days, considering the trading date until the contract maturity date

exercisePrice.description: Predetermined price of the underlying asset of the derivative contract

exerciseStyle.description: Code that defines how an option can be exercised
exerciseStyle.$comment: Consult External Code List table ExternalExerciseStyleCode

optionType.description: Specifies whether an option is call or put
optionType.$comment: Consult External Code List table ExternalOptionTypeCode

premiumUpfrontIndicator.description: Indicates whether equity options have their premium paid in advance or not

protectionFlag.description: Indicates that the option is protected against corporate events

automaticExerciseIndicator.description: Defines whether the option is exercised automatically
